title: Lountzis Says Buffett Remains Overwhelmingly Positive (Audio)
itunes:title: Lountzis Says Buffett Remains Overwhelmingly Positive (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Paul Lountzis, Founder of Lountzis Asset Management, on Berkshire Hathaway's annual shareholders’ meeting in Omaha, Nebraska.
